mapper.insert: insert into movie(title, description, release_date, rating, genre, director, poster_url) values(#{title},#{description}, #{releaseDate}, #{rating}, #{genre}, #{director}, #{posterUrl})
mapper.update: update movie set title=#{title}, description=#{description}, release_date=#{releaseDate}, rating=#{rating}, genre=#{genre}, director=#{director}, poster_url=#{posterUrl} where id=#{id}
